data.text:
@horton_marcus @Allegiant_Air We are available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and can be reached at 702-505-8888. For the shortest wait time, we encourage you to contact us during “off-peak” hours which is typically from 9 pm-4 am PT.  
Hope this helps. Thank you for choosing Allegiant Travel -SW

@ayyetinyrick We're sorry to learn that you're having issues. Please send us a DM with your details for review. - GM

@HerzbergJ Hi Jim! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. Options are provided in the cancellation notification that is sent to all impacted passengers, including options for compensation when offered. If you have specific questions or concerns, you may send us a DM. - C

@HolsteinEmma Hi Emma! Thanks for reaching out with this question. The determining factors in when, where, and how often we fly are numerous and ever-evolving. These factors include but are not limited to: demand for the service, aircraft/crew availability, and airport/ATC scheduling. - C

@TSternasty Hi Teresa! It is recommended that a hard case is used to hold your golf equipment, but not required. If you bring a soft-sided golf bag, a limited liability form would need to be signed at the time of check-in. https://t.co/2FS1VxSz1a - C

urls.title: Allegiant Air
urls.description: In order to keep fares as low as possible, Allegiant offers many a-la-carte services you can add to your travel itinerary for a fee. Fees are per person, per segment, or both. A segment is one take-off and one landing. Select your seat at the time of reservation. The optional Priority Access upgrade affords passengers the opportunity to board the plane before general boarding. Avoid most change and cancellation fees. Protect your travel purchase with Allegiant's Trip Flex. Flight Only or Car Packages
